name: divergence-monitor
description: AWS Lambda function for monitoring trading divergences

scripts.create: npm run build && aws lambda create-function --function-name divergence-monitor --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::917449735147:role/lambda-execution-role --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://deployment.zip --timeout 300 --memory-size 256
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name divergence-monitor --zip-file fileb://deployment.zip

author: Trading Monitor System
